rules.description: [PATCH] Global Ctrl+W / Ctrl+T -> Cmd+W / Cmd+T (exclude VS Code/JetBrains + terminals)
[CORE] Text navigation — Ctrl+Arrows = macOS Option+Arrows (exclude terminals)
[CORE] Ctrl shortcuts → Cmd shortcuts (exclude VS Code/JetBrains + terminals)
[CORE] Ctrl+Backspace/Delete — Delete word (exclude VS Code/JetBrains + terminals)
[PATCH][BROWSERS] Ctrl+Tab = NEXT tab; Ctrl+Shift+Tab = PREVIOUS tab (Windows parity)
[BROWSERS] Parity pack — tabs, refresh (F5), address bar, incognito, devtools, tab jump
[BROWSERS] Chromium extras — Downloads/History/Clear data/Zoom + Inspect Element
[VS CODE] Ctrl+Tab = PREVIOUS editor + Win+Space = Quick Open
[WIN CLIPBOARD] Ctrl+Insert=Copy, Shift+Insert=Paste, Shift+Delete=Cut (both Delete types)
[WIN LAYER] Win key shortcuts (Win = RIGHT_CMD) — system + window management (Rectangle + AppleScript)

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events"' -e 'repeat with theProcess in processes' -e 'if not background only of theProcess then' -e 'try' -e 'click (first button of (every window of (theProcess)) whose role description contains "minimize")' -e 'end try' -e 'end if' -e 'end repeat' -e 'end tell'
osascript -e 'tell application id "com.apple.systemevents" to tell (process 1 where it is frontmost) to set the value of the attribute named "AXMinimized" of every window to false'

manipulators.description: Win+Shift+Left/Right = Move window to previous/next monitor (Rectangle)
